lexUnit.name: shimmer.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: shine with a soft tremulous light.

sentence.text: The stars shimmered in their dustless , glittering clouds ; the terrace was like a stage beneath them .
The rock face behind them was silvered with moisture and shimmered like a silken curtain .
Beneath their balcony the sea shimmered blue .
The small shoal fish shimmer in the background .
The great landscape of lights glitters and shimmers in the warm evening air .
He was very aware of her body beside his , of the long legs that shimmered in the semi-darkness , and of the smell of her perfume .
From the cool of this cloister the island-dotted sea shimmered in the sunlight .
The gothic spires of parliament shimmered in the autumnal sunlight as they drove to the far side of Parliament Square and turned right towards Victoria .
She stared down at the scattered glass shimmering in the blackened water , remembered stories of people drowning in only inches of water and acknowledged her condition with a sinking heart .
It seemed he had been behind the same car for hours now -- a Jaguar whose iridescent blue reminded Dexter of oil shimmering on the surface of a puddle .
The fellow never seemed to age , nothing changed him ; no lines of worry on his cherubic face , while those hard , glassy eyes shimmered with a quiet amusement .
The gouged rock shimmers with crystals .
Every day he thought of Matthew , the small angelic face , the blue eyes shimmering with innocence .
The water 's surface shimmered with a million moon-fragments .
The white star-flowers of wild coffee spattered the banks and the feathery ballerina skirts of kapok shimmered with raindrops .
The Lady Chapel in blue , red and gold marble ; the choir and rood screen of carved , gleaming oak which shimmered in the light of hundreds of candles .
She was surprised how bare the gardens had become , except for the lopsided apple tree in the lower orchard whose branches still carried a crop of apples shimmering like tiny brassy moons .
Her dressing-table glitters and shimmers , it is festive like the night .
